materials.name: Lanthanides (III) (Er/Ho) coordination polymers

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with isopropanol and acetone several times
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated in a vacuum oven at 100 °C for 24 hours

characterization_techniques: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDX)
Magnetic field and temperature dependent studies

properties.chemical_stability: Stable in various solvents except water and dimethylformamide after 24 hours
properties.photocatalytic_activity: Highly active in CO2 cycloaddition reaction under UV light

materials.recycling: Stable after five consecutive cycles with almost no change in product conversion yields
